mapper.select:
select @rows:=@rows+1 as rows, if(@aqi=t.aqi,@rownum:=@rownum,@rownum:=@rownum+1) as rank, @aqi:=t.aqi,t.* from
(select b.id,a.mn,a.site_name,b.`level` as airLevel,b.level,a.area,b.aqi, a.company_id,b.DATA_TIME,b.FIRST_CODE, b.a21026_avg,b.a21004_avg,b.a3400201_avg,b.a3400224_avg, b.a21005_avg,b.a0502401_avg,b.a0502408_avg,b.a3400401_avg, b.a3400424_avg
from airq_day b
INNER JOIN(select a.mn, max(b.data_time) data_time from airq_day b left join site_monitor_point a on b.mn = a.mn WHERE b.state in (0,1) group by a.mn) c on b.mn = c.mn and b.data_time = c.data_time
left join site_monitor_point a on b.mn = a.mn WHERE b.state in (0,1)) t,(select @rownum:=0,@aqi:=0,@rows:=0) r where t.company_id in
#{id}
and t.area = (#{area})
and t.mn = (#{mn})
and t.data_time = (#{queryDate})
order by ISNULL(t.aqi), t.aqi asc

select @rows:=@rows+1 as rows, if(@aqi=t.aqi,@rownum:=@rownum,@rownum:=@rownum+1) as rank, @aqi:=t.aqi,t.* from
(select b.id,a.mn,a.site_name,b.`level` as airLevel,b.level,a.area,b.aqi, a.company_id,b.DATA_TIME,b.FIRST_CODE, b.a21026_avg,b.a21004_avg,b.a3400201_avg,b.a3400224_avg, b.a21005_avg,b.a0502401_avg,b.a0502408_avg,b.a3400401_avg, b.a3400424_avg
from airq_day b
INNER JOIN(select a.mn, max(b.data_time) data_time from airq_day b left join site_monitor_point a on b.mn = a.mn WHERE b.state in (0,1) group by a.mn) c on b.mn = c.mn and b.data_time = c.data_time
left join site_monitor_point a on b.mn = a.mn WHERE b.state in (0,1)) t,(select @rownum:=0,@aqi:=0,@rows:=0) r where t.company_id in
#{id}
and t.area = (#{area})
and t.mn = (#{mn})
and t.data_time = (#{queryDate})
order by ISNULL(t.aqi), t.aqi asc

select site_name siteName, b.data_time dataTime, b.mn mn, aqi AQI, A3400424_IAQI A34004, A3400224_IAQI A34002, A21026_IAQI A21026, A21004_IAQI A21004, A21005_IAQI A21005, A0502408_IAQI A05024 from airq_day b left join site_monitor_point a on b.mn = a.mn WHERE b.state in (0,3) and a.site_type = '3' and b.level !='7' and b.mn = (#{mn})
and b.data_time >= (#{dateBegin})
and b.data_time <= (#{dateEnd})
order by b.data_time asc

select site_name siteName, b.data_time dataTime, b.mn mn, b.level level, aqi AQI, a3400401_avg A34004, a3400201_avg A34002, a21026_avg A21026, a21004_avg A21004, a21005_avg A21005, a0502401_avg A05024, a01001_avg A01001, a01002_avg A01002, a01006_avg A01006, a01007_avg A01007, a01008_avg A01008, first_code firstCode from airq_day b left join site_monitor_point a on b.mn = a.mn WHERE b.state in (0,3) and a.site_type = '3' and b.level !='7' and b.mn = (#{mn})
and b.data_time >= (#{dateBegin})
and b.data_time < (#{dateEnd})
order by b.data_time desc
